lines.text: Run for your lives! Charlie's got an axe!
Louis's in trouble, his mouse just had puppies!
We need to know the width of the mouse.

[seeing Gaby's French wife]
Viva la-Viva la-Viva la French!
RFD, COD, SOS, and DDT. And I glimpsed to the right. Now there was a hunk of IQ.
[Sach is shown wearing a dunce hat and sitting in the corner]
The lunkhead that flunked. Dean Pettyboff, that old bachelor of arts, was deliverin' one of his pertinently incoherent speeches...
